products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: ThermoBlock Blackout White Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our exclusive ThermoBlock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. 
 
A whiteelectric roller blind easily brightens up the space,  and our ThermoBlock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.   This off-white blackout roller has a silver UV-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter,  a great option for hot offices or sunrooms. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more difficult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space.  Why not pair with our Smart Hub - control your blinds from the comfort of your phone while away, or pair with Amazon Alexa or Google Home Hub for a truly streamlined experience. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years' experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This white electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2138 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Silver UV-Reflecting Thermal Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.productdescription:

This crisp white electric roller blind is bang on trend so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blockout the light when desired.

products.title: Isla PVC Blackout Whisper White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Isla PVC Blackout Whisper White Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £151.50 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The subtleness of this exquisite Isla PVC Blackout Whisper White electric roller blind adds just enough pretty interest to dress up a window. In the palest white with a leafy double-sided design it’s perfect to create a light and airy space. Ideal for a soft, feminine bedroom, a bathroom or to add a delicate focal point in a kitchen, this dreamy blind is made using a blackout fabric to keep daylight out when you need to and a safe, flame retardant finish. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.  
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1981 Fabric Colour: Whisper White Material: 3 Ply Vinyl, 1 Ply Fibreglass Lining: Pattern Match Backing - See sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Willow Blackout Birch White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Willow Blackout Birch White Electric Roller Blind in White/Grey. Made to measure from £158.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Soft, muted grey with wispy willow branches make a delicate Willow Blackout Birch White electric blackout roller blind choice for a bedroom or living area. It blends well with most neutral décor and gives a feminine yet contemporary feel to your chosen space. Finished with Pollergen™, it is a good option for hayfever sufferers as it neutralises pollen so reducing symptoms. The electric operation is easy to use and the blind opens and closes at the touch of a button. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2002 Fabric Colour: White Material: 29% PVC 71% Fibreglass Lining: White Blackout Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
